hiveArticle.title: All Upward Movement Lost in a Single Day
hiveArticle.body:
Though not written in a title, I am talking about Bitcoin. If you see the chart below Bitcoin has started the upward movement on 21st of September and after that it was gaining momentum though slowly but in the last 24 hours it has lost more than what it gained in 15 days i.e. all the work done by Bitcoin in 15 days is been lost and it has to start again.

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZwLTERv9Dbg5FuRkejfncTwwKpTKBnRp3kmfStakuvUR/image.png)
PC : Bittrex.com

Why Its happen, because few things that Goldman Sachs has reduced the priority to participate in the Crypto market and it had made investors to take out the money from Bitcoin.

Not only Bitcoin but all  the 7 best currencies on CryptoMarketCap has plunged above 10%

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQme6DFPXADRg1hk63LPwPzDF6DyZxbP3pNfMBpJpsvfbf5/image.png)
PC : CryptoMarketCap.com
